website_summaries.verdict: A small and sturdy vacuum pump that can keep most opened wine for up to two weeks.
pros: Small, lightweight, and easy to use
Includes four colorful stoppers, which also prevent any wine leakage
cons: Slightly more expensive than most simple vacuum pumps

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this device! It is simple to use and more importantly, IT WORKS! Our wine stays fresh for several days (we rarely need more than 2 days, I’m sure it would last longer). We’re ordering several more as these will make excellent gifts for our wine loving friends! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: shotgun20

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Vacu Vin wine saver pump before, but the tops kept splitting at the seam and not holding the vacuum. This seems to be a little different system, but works much better. I doesn't click so it took a while for us to figure out just how many pumps it takes to create a good vacuum, but we got the hang of it; a few pumps usually do the trick. The stoppers fit the wine bottles better than the Vacu Vin and I think this pump creates a much better vacuum; I also think the wine keeps longer with this pump. I'm so glad I decided to buy this wine saver!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold its seal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item several months ago based on the excellent reviews. I did not notice than many of the reviews were from people who received a product discount for their reviews. This product is attractive and seems to work, but does not hold a seal for more than a few hours. I have now ordered an different wine pump from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Worse, the stoppers leak
customer_reviews.text: I found it hard to get the pump to seal against the stopper. Worse, the stoppers leak. Wwhenever I pull a bottle back out of the fridge, there's no vacuum left. If it cannot maintain the vacuum for several days, what's the point?
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product, Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Simple, works every time. I lost one of the stoppers (it came with two) so I might need to get another one. Works much better than the all-in-one vacuum pump (where the pump and plug are the same piece) and is easier to use. Love it, would totallly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Spendstoomuchonamazon

customer_reviews.title: I knew it was a lot better quality than the one I had
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wine pump as a replacement to one I have used for several years. Right off the bat, I knew it was a lot better quality than the one I had. It isn't the fanciest money can buy, but for the price, it is great quality. It is very easy to pump. My wine lasts days longer than it did with my old pump. The flavor is barely different days later than from the first day you opened the wine! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May return if not happy with it -
customer_reviews.text: the seal between the unit and the "cork" while vacuuming does not seem as efficient as should be. When I push down on the "cork" to release air Im not sure it is working. Too many IFs and so 3 stars for now. May return if not happy with it - TBD
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: wine and rubber don't mix
customer_reviews.text: cups after couple times start falling apart and rubber pieces start falling in the wine .
customer_reviews.author: frank from ciro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Wine Preserver Pump does a great job of keeping wine fresh longer.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Produces good vacuum and seal that keeps wine fresher longer. I've had one bottle open for over a week and it still tastes as good as when I opened it. Simple to use. I plan to give it as a gift to my friends who love wine.
customer_reviews.author: S.V. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Does everything it says. Very satisfied. By vacuuming out the air in the bottle our red wine tastes as good 3 or 4 days later. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: roz klein

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This wine saver pump really works well. Very easy to use. I am very happy with this purchase. Thank you Riverside Shop for selling a good product on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shohola Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: The FastOVacuum Wine Preserver Pump does exactly as advertised, at a very reasonable price. I am by no means an expert as far as these types of products are concerned, but it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: mark woodford

customer_reviews.title: Essential device for wine lovers
customer_reviews.text: Operates smoothly, does the job - pulls air out of the bottle so the wine lasts several days or even weeks without oxidizing. Stainless steel so it won't rust. I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: BBinNOLA

customer_reviews.title: Only fits one size bottle
customer_reviews.text: Received it quick, works as it should. Only problem is not all bottles are the same therefore the "stopper" doesn't fit larger bottles or bottles with a twist-off caps.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: WINE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm not a drinker, this pump works just great for me. I can have a bottle of wine in the frig for over a month and it will still taste the same from using this vacuum pump.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good/junk
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum pump works well, however the stoppers or caps failed after just a few uses. This product has very good ratings maybe I just got some bad ones?
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: good for wine lovers
customer_reviews.text: it works well and creates good vacuum, lasts long and will recommend to all. it is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: nil

customer_reviews.title: Directions were easy to follow and it worked well
customer_reviews.text: Directions were easy to follow and it worked well. We've used it on standard size wine bottles (both originally corked and screw tops) and the quality of the wine has been maintained. The little plastic package it came in has kept the pieces together in our pantry without taking up much space. And I love that it's dishwasher safe. It seals much better if you remember to wet the stopper (or rewet it between uses)!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pain to use because you have to wrap your hand all the way around it and squeeze really tight in order to create a seal make it work (hard to explain - sorry if that doesn't make much sense). I've had it for about a year and I think it's time to replace because I've tried out other wine sealers and they are much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I love my stainless steel wine pump! It works and looks great! This would be a perfect gift for any wine lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stutt

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: It does not grip to suction out air. It does not work on any bottle.
customer_reviews.author: M.N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Works better then the last kind I had. Super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: hittgurl

customer_reviews.title: Parts cracked
customer_reviews.text: The bottom hard ring on the pump cracked after a few months. One of the seal rings on the plug started to tear.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the size, not to big, fits in the drawer easily and its easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Great shipper. I recommend this item if you want to save wine when you can't finish the bottle. His will keep it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Mead

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It seems to keep a seal and prolong wine life. Unlike the compressed gas canisters it's a one time purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rod R

customer_reviews.title: but pump doesn't feel like it's doing much
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, but pump doesn't feel like it's doing much, better then putting plastic over the bottle, but it could be better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: a must for wine drinkers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. It did what it says it does. It preserves the wine longer. Easy to use. I can once again start drinking wine without worrying about not finishing the bottle in one sitting.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect good quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was and worked as described by seller. Perfect good quality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, it really works, now I can enjoy my red wine for more days.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It's easy to operate and I don't have to worry about my wine going bad anymore. Love it! I have already recommended it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works easily and efficiently. Has kept our wine fresh much longer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to get more air out of the bottle than my previous wine saver.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: but effect is great. Hope to find an easier one at some ...
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky, but effect is great. Hope to find an easier one at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Familyof6

customer_reviews.title: It would work better for me if the lip on top of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The last pump I had made a clicking sound when you had reached max vacuum. On this one you don't know when you have all the vacuum you can get. Hard to keep the pump on the stopper. It would work better for me if the lip on top of the stopper was a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Phil B. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I bought this product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, so far so good. I would have liked for a sound or sign telling me all the air has been vacuumed out but I am glad I bought this. I do feel it works better than just a regular stopper.
customer_reviews.author: ndagame21

customer_reviews.title: feel like I had to apply the vacuum the next day ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my Cabernet and tasted it after opening 3days earlier (don't ask why it lasted that long). I was pleasantly surprised! I do, however, feel like I had to apply the vacuum the next day (it seems as though air seeped in).
customer_reviews.author: Kameela

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Seals right. You can turn the wine upside down and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: djplumb

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to use it until Lent was over!!! BUT it really works well. Keeps the wine "fresh" and drinkable. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tinyfrog

customer_reviews.title: This pump is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This pump is easy to use, inexpensive, and it really does preserve the quality of the wine in an opened bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Lundstrom

customer_reviews.title: Cheers!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Very impressed at how well it helps preserve wine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Deavers

customer_reviews.title: Works geat
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job to remove air from bottle and increase life of the wine.
customer_reviews.author: Nate B

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the ease of this thing and cannot believe it took me years to own one.
customer_reviews.author: Carie

customer_reviews.title: unit works to withdraw gas and is better built than many models available
customer_reviews.text: Lack of availability of 2-3 more stoppers is weak, unit works to withdraw gas and is better built than many models available.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: but it works great!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few minutes to figure it out..... but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. New York

customer_reviews.title: This product doesn't suck the air out of my wine bottles
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't suck the air out of my wine bottles. I keep pumping and pumping and pumping with little resistance. I needed to replace my old Metrokane and saw this product and only purchased it because of all the 5 star reviews. What a disappointment. I'm returning it and buying what I should have bought in the first place. At least I know Metrokane works.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: I was initially skeptical about this item as it did not feel sturdy and was considerably lighter than my previous vac
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an Oneida vac which has broken. I was initially skeptical about this item as it did not feel sturdy and was considerably lighter than my previous vac. This vac performs much better than what I had with a very strong vacuum achieved with minimal effort. The stoppers are tight - you will need to use some pressure to plug a bottle tightly. It maintains a vacuum with no slow leaks which are a problem with some of my old stoppers. This vac also works great on other stoppers so if you have a big wine party, you can plug several bottles with this.
customer_reviews.author: kittycat qurrio

customer_reviews.title: Utterly useless. Just this evening I pumped this thing twenty ...
customer_reviews.text: Utterly useless. Just this evening I pumped this thing twenty times to remove air from a half full bottle of wine, then an hour later decided I wanted another glass. The stopper removed without the slightest hiss of suction. This is not the first time this has happened, but I wasn't previously aware the suction disappeared so far. The stopper was fully pushed into the bottle neck. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: designinca

customer_reviews.title: Savour the Favour
customer_reviews.text: I like wine. I do not like that it goes bad so fast. I'm a single person and I cannot drink a whole bottle on one go! So, I went looking for a reusable cor of some kind. Who knew there were so many? I did not. I settled on this one due to it being a vacuum seal and it comes with 2 "corks" and it was cost effective too. I recommend this wine stopper for anyone that loves wine as much as I do and wants to keep it longer than just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other pumps I've used
customer_reviews.text: The directions tell you to pump until you feel resistance. I never detect resistance. It does give you a guide for the number of pumps per volume. I prefer my other pump that clicks when it's sealed. With this pump, I don't really know when it's appropriately sealed. The wine doesn't seem to be preserved as well as other pumps. It's fine for the price, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: K Ro

customer_reviews.title: Very good pump and bottle sealer
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an extra one, and this one advertised smooth action and better construction. When I got it I fully agree. It slides/ pumps smoother than my other. Materials do see higher quality and the pump action is effortless. The stoppers are a bit different than my orginal. Seals well but sometime a little more effort to remove- no issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only takes 5 pumps or so to suck out all the air. My only issue is that the cork is a bit tricky to release the pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gross

customer_reviews.title: Let's Me Alternate Between Different Wines During the Week
customer_reviews.text: This product has been awesome for us. My husband and I usually only open one bottle at a time because we know there's a limited amount of time until wine goes stale. With this product, we were thrilled to be able to open and try 2 bottles of wine over a period of a week with dinner. We love that it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and great to give and receive as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and great to give and receive as a gift. Works well and so easy! I have been able to keep wine for a week (or more) and it still tastes just as good with the last glass as the first glass! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Love2talktravel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I had this for about a week and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I had this for about a week and it's Amazing!! Love the pop it makes when you take it off. I know your supposed to push the button but I like it so much lol
customer_reviews.author: Truth Reviews

customer_reviews.title: necessity for those who can't drink a whole bottle in one sitting!
customer_reviews.text: I can barely drink more than 2 wines in one sitting so this ensures our wine stays fresh for much longer! i've always used it on champagne bottles to keep the bubbles in!
customer_reviews.author: Megha

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Vacuum Wine Saver Pump
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, delivered promptly, at a fair price. x x x x x x x x x x x x

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This - The Corks Leak
customer_reviews.text: I liked this wine vacuum pump & cork (2 corks come with it) at first, but after several months' use each of the 2 corks started to leak, and pretty soon each was useless. I just bought a Vacu Vin pump and 3 corks, and they appear to be much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: R Nova

customer_reviews.title: This pump is great. I have another one but I could not ...
customer_reviews.text: This pump is great. I have another one but I could not get the stopper out of the bottle. I do not have that problem with this stopper. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Pump with one hand....push down to seal with the other...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter.. wouldn't work for her... found out she had no downward pressure with one hand while she pumped with the other.. Now she has no problem and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: William Foos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wine pump and stoppers
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum wine Pump is awesome, it work perfect. Just follow the instructions. My wine tasted great after a week in the refrigerator when I used the stopper. I would definitely recommend this pump and stoppers. I turned it sideways and didn't leak out. I have already placed another order with additional stoppers. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Green

customer_reviews.title: my $40 bottle of wine went bad in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: my $40 bottle of wine went bad in 3 days. It clearly doesn't work. That's about as long as it takes for wine to go bad without this specialized $10 pump

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: working normally. But it's just hard to tell it is sealed or not after pumping.

customer_reviews.title: recommended to extend the life of opened wines
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here, recommended to extend the life of opened wines. You have to press hard on the stoppers for it to work, not sure if that is the case with other vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Matto80

customer_reviews.title: Got for my boyfriend for Valentines. I have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got for my boyfriend for Valentines. I have a set and he is always talking about getting his own. He was excited!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth having
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it on one bottle but it appears to do exactly what it is meant to do. I'm happy with the product and would recommend it to anyone wanting to extend the life of a good bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fishman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 more as gifts. This is the best. It's so easy to use and it really keeps your wine fresh. Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Stoppers don't hold the vacuum long
customer_reviews.text: Seemed good at first, but the stoppers don't hold the vacuum long. Bottles on their side eventually leak.
customer_reviews.author: CoconutGrover

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and quality looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Item was received as expected. The size is great, not bulky. The product looks great. It is for a gift, so I will get back after the holidays with an update.
customer_reviews.author: Rpendo

customer_reviews.title: Stoppers fail to hold vacuum for more than a few hours...
customer_reviews.text: ...why so many 4 and 5 star rates for an inferior product? This is at best a 1 star product, but I rate it a ZERO! It simply does NOT do its intended job of HOLDING vacuum for any length of time, which is key to preserving the wine and keeping it for oxidizing. I have returned the product for a refund because the stoppers simple leak air back into the bottles in a very short period of time rendering the product useless! UPDATE: ...for a truly "quality" product buy the "Vacu Vin Wine Saver Pump" - a 5 Star product!!!
customer_reviews.author: 5starseeker

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and I must say we were surprised at how well it works. I plan to purchase more to give to our friends.

customer_reviews.text: It was good for the first one month only. Now the corks are not tight fit anymore and don't maintain any vacuum for more than 10 mins. I dont recommend these. I don't use these anymore, instead I use the wooden cork that comes with the wine bottle, as it holds tight and I'm sure there is no more air leak than the air already present it the bottle before closing back.

customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife, then she divorced me. I don't know. I guess high-quality products like this just don't cut it these days.

product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Vacuum Wine Saver Pump - Wine Sealer - Wine Preserver with 4 x Vacuum Colored Bottle Stoppers
feature_bullets: WINE SAVER-Unlike fragile plastic pumps, our wine preserver pump is made of sturdy stainless steel that can last a lifetime and ABS plastic. Creates an airtight vacuum that preserves wine once the bottle has been opened. Protects your opened wine from oxidation & bacteria even for 14 days.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS-The kit comes with 2 reusable rubber stoppers that fit most kind of wine bottles. It is more environmentally friendly than silicone, non-toxic and safe! FREE eBOOK included.
GREAT GIFT IDEA and MONEY SAVER for wine lovers, occasional drinkers, home or wine bars, restaurants, house warming, anniversaries, family reunions, different events, wine tastings or festivals.

EASY TO USE – Our vacuum wine sealer is a hand operated pump. Simply cap an opened bottle with one of the stoppers and then place the pump over the stopper and start pumping the air out until resistance.

100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION OR YOUR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE! We want you to be thrilled with our FastOVacuum preservation kit purchase. Should you have any problems at all, let us know and we'll promptly make it right immediately.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars176 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
